Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Central
ShortDescription: EB 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Central, 24th, Laramie and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Central, 24th, Laramie and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Central.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
